sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Dwelling Structure Contract Act.

sections.heading: As used in this Act, unless the context requires otherwise:
sections.text: As used in this Act, unless the context requires otherwise:

sections.heading: After the effective date of this Act all contracts for the sale of
sections.text:
a dwelling structure may be recorded or registered with the recorder or
the Registrar of Titles in the same manner as a deed or other
document relating to the title of the real estate to be sold. Any provision
in a contract for the sale of a dwelling structure which forbids the
contract buyer to record the contract or provides that recording shall not
constitute notice or provides for any penalty for recording is void.

sections.heading: This Act shall not affect the validity of any contract
sections.text: executed before the effective date of this Act.
